channel.title: Rooney Mara on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Rooney Mara on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Voice of Hind Rajab’ World Premiere Roars in Venice With 21-Minute Standing Ovation and “Free Palestine” Chants
item.description: Brad Pitt, Joaquin Phoenix, Rooney Mara and Alfonso Cuarón boarded the drama, which tells the story of a 6-year-old who pleaded for help from a car in Gaza her family was killed by Israeli tank fire.
